segments.text: Yes , I'd like to look at some suits .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , this way please . What size do you wear ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Size 41 . I want something in dark flannel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It feels all right . But if it were a darker color , I'd like it better . This seems too light for winter . Do you think you could get me one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I'll show you something darker . Do you like this one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It looks good . But can I try it on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . Let me help you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . It's comfortable . Well , how much is it , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . I'll take it . Here's the money .
segments.speaker: S2
